fplR
  • Reference
  • Articles

Summary data for teams in the current FPL season

Gives a tibble containing summary data for all teams in the current FPL season.

teams()

Examples

teams()
#> # A tibble: 20 x 23
#>       id current_event_fixture   next_event_fixture           name  code
#>  * <int>                <list>               <list>          <chr> <int>
#>  1     1  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]>        Arsenal     3
#>  2     2  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]>    Bournemouth    91
#>  3     3  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]>       Brighton    36
#>  4     4  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]>        Burnley    90
#>  5     5  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]>        Chelsea     8
#>  6     6  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]> Crystal Palace    31
#>  7     7  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]>        Everton    11
#>  8     8  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]>   Huddersfield    38
#>  9     9  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]>      Leicester    13
#> 10    10  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]>      Liverpool    14

#> 15    15  <data.frame [1 x 6]> <data.frame [1 x 6]>          Stoke   110
